title: #2: What should our Balancer Smart Pool Parameters be?
body:
Forum Thread: https://gov.metafactory.ai/t/proposal-2-balancer-smart-pool-for-robot/85

The proposed parameters for our Balancer Smart Pool:

**ROBOT weight:** 70% ROBOT
**ETH weight:** 30% ETH
**Can pause swapping:** false
**Can change swap fee:** true
**Can change weights:** true
**Can change tokens:** true
**Can restrict LPs to a whitelist:** true
**Can limit total BPT supply:** false

**Swap Fee:** 4.20% or 3% (can change in the future, this is just the initial parameter. Higher swap fee = more incentive to LP + less impermanent loss, at the expense of people wanting to buy/sell ROBOT)
choices: I agree with these parameters with a 4.20% initial swap fee
I agree with these parameters with a 3% initial swap fee
I disagree with these parameters and will post my concerns in the forums
author: 0x8F942ECED007bD3976927B7958B50Df126FEeCb5
